verses.roman:
hena ye govinda prabhu, pāinu yāṅhā haite
tāṅhāra caraṇa-kṛpā ke pāre varṇite

synonyms: hena—thus; ye govinda—this Lord Govinda; prabhu—master; pāinu—I got; yāṅhā haite—from whom; tāṅhāra—His; caraṇa-kṛpā—mercy of the lotus feet; ke—who; pāre—is able; varṇite—to describe.
translation: Therefore who can describe the mercy of the lotus feet of Him [Lord Nityānanda] by whom I have attained the shelter of this Lord Govinda?
